short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick of people implying that Hillary and Bill Clinton are the same? Cut out the middle man and just replace it yourself

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick and tired of people insinuating Hillary Clinton is actually Bill? Think they're one and the same? Cut out the middle-man and just replace the text yourself.

(Note - as you can see, does not replace text 'Hillary Rodham Clinton', only 'Hillary Clinton')
